body:
Currently, Competitive has been added to the server. Ranked is in development and is confirmed as a gamemode, however right now as it stands they are just different in maps. In order to keep it true to competition and make it a better environment, I have the following suggestions. Feel free to include your own.

- Add blindness on the respawn screen to prevent ghosting (confirmed)
- Make tactical information punishments harsher on competitive/ranked (proposed)
- Enable team chat by default instead of global chat
- Prevent joining once the match has started
body_tagged:
Currently, Competitive has been added to the server. Ranked is in development and is confirmed as a gamemode, however right now as it stands they are just different in maps. In order to keep it true to competition and make it a better environment, I have the following suggestions. Feel free to include your own.

- Add blindness on the respawn screen to prevent ghosting (confirmed)
- Make tactical information punishments harsher on competitive/ranked (proposed)
- Enable team chat by default instead of global chat
- Prevent joining once the match has started
title: Improving Competitive & Ranked?

replies.body:
- Prevent donors or non donors joining at all after team cap (usually 8)
- Make a plugin like in OCN that doesn't allow team stacking: "If Red will remain stacked random players will be moved to Blue."

replies.body:
Posighdun and myself have been tasked with planning ranked. We have a lot of ideas, but we can't really tell all of them - we want some surprises.

  • Possible 'pro' league - MAYBE a prize pool - depends on the revenue made from donations. And we'd still have to talk to Kylo.
  • Global Chat and /msg  disabled in game
  • 2 minutes to strategise
  • A real ranking system that organises teams
  • Donators get more extra matches
  • Requirements
  • Punishments for leaving
  • Noone can join mid match
  • Substitute queue
  • Placement matches
replies.body_tagged:

  • Global Chat and /msg  disabled in game
  • 2 minutes to strategise
  • A real ranking system that organises teams
  • Donators get more extra matches
  • Requirements
  • Punishments for leaving
  • Noone can join mid match
  • Substitute queue
  • Placement matches

replies.body:
I would like to see a separate leaderboard just for these ranked matches. You can see who is doing well and possibly find some new recruits nobody ever heard of.

Also, is it possible to make all players who are in queue for the game use TS? I wouldn't want to play a competitive game without communication.

replies.body:
To make it more interesting...

*Dont allow users to choose their teams (even if they are premium)
*60 Seconds of team strating
*Requirements (to prevent noobs)
*Ranked ranks, example: bronze 1 , silver 2 , gold 3, etc
*Punishments for leavers
*No one can join in the middle of the whole match
*Infinite rankeds for anyone (more than 10 doe)
*

replies.body:
That's completely invalid considering the fact that other servers use this method too, not only for ranked.

I find it very hard to understand why people say this. But this is a completely different server. So why compare it to another server that other people play on. Just because you're from ocn, some people (including staff) might not know what ocn is. So you really shouldn't compare these ideas to ocn when some important people involved in this update might not know what ocn is.
